Reduce unused JavaScript, Potential savings of 299KiB
Serve images in next-gen formats, Potential savings of 112KiB

`[user-scalable="no"]` is used in the `<meta name="viewport">` element or the `[maximum-scale]` attribute is less than 5.
Document does not have a meta description

Ensure text remains visible during webfont load

Use video formats for animated content
Remove duplicate modules in JavaScript bundles
Avoids enormous network payloads, Total size was 791KiB
Avoids an excessive DOM size, 136 elements

Uses passive listeners to improve scrolling performance
Avoid long main-thread tasks, 1 long task found

ARIA attributes are used as specified for the element's role

List items (`<li>`) are contained within `<ul>`, `<ol>` or `<menu>` parent elements

Elements with visible text labels have matching accessible names.

Avoids requesting the notification permission on page load

Ensure proper origin isolation with COOP
Allows users to paste into input fields

No browser errors logged to the console
No issues in the `Issues` panel in Chrome Devtools
Page has successful HTTP status code
